name: 3D Electric Car Racing - EV All-Terrain Real Driving Simulator Game FREE
name_original: 3D Electric Car Racing - EV All-Terrain Real Driving Simulator Game FREE
description:
Pick your favorite All-Electric Car as you race it across several different environments. City or Snow, your choice to see how these cars handle in real world scenarios. How fast can you go before you wreck your ride? Not for the weak of heart

Features:
- Real World Electric Cars
- 2 high quality 3D environments
- Reverse Mode
- Realistic Driving Physics
